output_list.criticism: The transfer function does not check if the sender's balance is sufficient to cover the transaction amount plus the burnPerTransaction. This could lead to an integer overflow if the sender's balance is very large.
The _transfer function does not check if the recipient's balance will overflow. This could lead to an integer overflow if the recipient's balance is very large.
The burn function does not check if the sender's balance will overflow. This could lead to an integer overflow if the sender's balance is very large.
